pr_title: DB-10734 expose entire row history to foreign key child interceptor

timeline.message: DB-10734 expose entire row history to foreign key child interceptor.

timeline.bodyText: I don't like this long pause here. Without the pause I think most of the times the next insert will happen before we have a chance to remove the rollback (specially if we have everything set up, the connection, prepared statement, etc), so I'd rather do that than introduce 30 more seconds of runtime on ITs
timeline.author: dgomezferro
dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: I think something like this would be better to reduce the window of time between the rollback and the update, but as it is it looks fine to me.
